name: Werewolf (itch) (GoedWare)
description:
Prototype game for the first  Dutch Unity Community Game Jam.

The theme was: "You are the Villian!"

Was not able to finish it or have any real goals in the game, but you can play it and maybe have some fun.. And you can also die... Performance can be a bit bad because of the time constraint.

You are a Werewolf on an Island and you can roam freely and kill all the people around...  How to play
  • Use the [Arrow] keys or [WASD] to move
  • Use [Left-Shift] or [Right-Shift] to run
  • Use [Space] to attack
  • Use [E] to eat death people (and get some health back)
  • Use [R] to roar 😊
  • Hit [Esc] to exit the game
Gameplay

You are a Werewolf on a remote Island. There are people on the Island trying to kill you. But you are a powerful Werewolf and you are hungry..

In the top center of your screen you can see the Moon. The moon determines your Wolfpower. 

If the moon is fully visible you have 100% Wolfpower. 

When clouds begin to appear and move in front of the moon, your Wolfpower decreases. Below 50% Wolfpower you return back to human form. 

In human form you are more vulnerable for attacks (more damage) and you are less quick. When the clouds are going away, your Wolfpower will rise again and you will transform to your powerful Werewolf state.

Enemies

There are 3 type of enemies

  • Without wapen, can not harm you.
  • With a gun, can harm you.
  • With a rifle, can really harm you.

I hope you enjoy this Game Jam prototype!
